title: Text Processing Techniques
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Cleaning raw text for AI. 
- **Tokenization**: Splitting into words.
- **Stemming**: Cutting endings (Running -> Run).
- **Lemmatization**: Dictionary root (Better -> Good).

interview_questions.question: Stemming vs Lemmatization?
interview_questions.answer: Stemming is fast but crude (Chopping). Lemmatization is slow but accurate (Grammar).
